event.title: I am...
event.text: A Front End Developer! But also a Motion Designer!

event.title: I describe myself as...
event.text: A problem solver, a creative person and a funny girl!

event.title: My technical skills:
event.text: Javascript, ES6, HTML5, CSS3, Git, React, NodeJS, Firebase, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere, Autodesk Maya, Cinema 4D

event.title: My hobbies:
event.text: Videogames, martial arts, metal music and baking
